parameters: [Day one of being in prison. I bet I
could escape today, this place is rusty]
[God there's even a hole in the wall.
it seems no guards are around.*
[It might be good to get a few
allies to escape with. Always better to
though, I could take the time to
check the hole out. I'd just fit in.]
*Use the arrow keys to move around. Press space to
interact with objects. Hold shift or set always
run to true in options to run.*
*Press escape to open the menu. There you
can use items, certain characters abilities,
and equip better armor and weapons.*
A crack in the wall. This might be useful later.
It's dark down there, but I think I see a
Whoa, I think this is an old mine. Maybe
there's another hole that leads out of
I'm Durian. And this is Accella.
place. We could use some help.
So I guess I'll tag along.
Use the guard key and open the cell?
Use the guard key and open the cell?
Use the guard key and open the cell?
Guys come on, don't leave Gale behind!
Hey, thanks for opening my cell!
I'm Michelle. Nice to meet you.
And I'm Accella. Nice to formally meet
We're on our way to escape this place.
Sure! We should grab my friend as well.
There's a secret passage in the old mine

a waterfall broke it the other day.
